property.name: text
property.value: For this model to work, you must first start an instance of a semantic repository (with data) named "AccessorsAndHosts" on localhost port 7200. This can be accomplished by creating a graphDB repo of that name and importing the files: accessor/accessors/ontology/OutputAccessors.ttl and accessor/accessors/ontology/OutputHosts.ttl. If these files are not up-to-date, consider rerunning the node scripts "accessorOntologyBuilder.js" and "hostOntologyBuilder.js" in the same directory.

property.name: text
property.value:
This model illustrates the use of the HostCompatability accessor: a typical accessor in the accessors repo (net/XBee.js) is tested for module compatability with different hosts.
Observe HostCompatability1 is given the Browser host as a parameter and HostCompatability2 is given the Nashorn host.

entity.name: StringConst
entity.doc: Create a constant sequence with a string value.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: script
